tools.name: create_document
tools.description:
Creates a new Word document and sets metadata such as title, author, and subject.

    Args:
        title (str): The title of the document.
        author (str): The author of the document.
        subject (str): The subject of the document.

    Returns:
        str: A success message with the document's file path.

    Example:
        create_document(title="My Document", author="John Doe", subject="Sample Subject")

tools.name: get_document_text
tools.description:
Extracts all text content from an existing Word document.

    Args:
        file_path (str): The path to the document file.

    Returns:
        str: A string containing the full text of the document.

    Example:
        get_document_text(file_path="example.docx")

tools.name: add_paragraph
tools.description:
Adds a paragraph of text to the document.

    Args:
        file_path (str): The path to the document file.
        text (str): The paragraph text to add.

    Returns:
        str: A success message confirming the addition.

    Example:
        add_paragraph(file_path="example.docx", text="This is a new paragraph.")

tools.name: add_heading
tools.description:
Adds a heading of a specified level to the document.

    Args:
        file_path (str): The path to the document file.
        text (str): The heading text.
        level (int): The heading level (1-6).

    Returns:
        str: A success message confirming the addition.

    Example:
        add_heading(file_path="example.docx", text="Chapter 1", level=1)

tools.name: create_custom_style
tools.description:
Creates a custom text style for the document.

    Args:
        file_path (str): The path to the document file.
        style_name (str): The name of the custom style.
        font_name (str): The font name for the style.
        font_size (int): The font size.
        bold (bool): Whether the text is bold.
        italic (bool): Whether the text is italicized.

    Returns:
        str: A success message confirming the style creation.

    Example:
        create_custom_style(file_path="example.docx", style_name="CustomStyle", font_name="Arial", font_size=12, bold=True, italic=False)

tools.name: format_text
tools.description:
Formats a specific range of text in the document with a custom style.

    Args:
        file_path (str): The path to the document file.
        start (int): The start index of the text range.
        end (int): The end index of the text range.
        style_name (str): The name of the custom style to apply.

    Returns:
        str: A success message confirming the formatting.

    Example:
        format_text(file_path="example.docx", start=0, end=10, style_name="CustomStyle")

tools.name: protect_document
tools.description:
Adds password protection to the document.

    Args:
        file_path (str): The path to the document file.
        password (str): The password to protect the document.

    Returns:
        str: A success message confirming the protection.

    Example:
        protect_document(file_path="example.docx", password="securepassword")

tools.name: add_footnote_to_document
tools.description:
Adds a footnote to the document.

    Args:
        file_path (str): The path to the document file.
        text (str): The footnote text.

    Returns:
        str: A success message confirming the addition.

    Example:
        add_footnote_to_document(file_path="example.docx", text="This is a footnote.")

tools.name: get_paragraph_text_from_document
tools.description:
Retrieves the text of a specific paragraph by index.

    Args:
        file_path (str): The path to the document file.
        paragraph_index (int): The index of the paragraph.

    Returns:
        str: A string containing the text of the specified paragraph.

    Example:
        get_paragraph_text_from_document(file_path="example.docx", paragraph_index=0)

tools.name: find_text_in_document
tools.description:
Searches for a specific text in the document and returns its occurrences.

    Args:
        file_path (str): The path to the document file.
        search_text (str): The text to search for.

    Returns:
        str: A list of indices where the text occurs.

    Example:
        find_text_in_document(file_path="example.docx", search_text="sample")

create_document.case_name: Basic Document Creation with Default Metadata
create_document.purpose: 验证工具能否使用默认参数创建一个新的Word文档并正确设置元数据
测试空字符串作为参数时是否仍能成功创建文档

create_document.case_name: Document Creation with Special Characters in Metadata
create_document.purpose: 验证特殊字符在标题、作者和主题字段中的处理能力

new line and	tab

get_document_text.purpose: 验证工具能否从一个有效的Word文档中提取全部文本内容

get_document_text.case_name: Text Extraction from Empty Word Document
get_document_text.purpose: 测试工具从一个空的Word文档中提取文本时的行为，应返回空字符串

get_document_text.case_name: Security Test - Attempt Path Traversal Attack
get_document_text.purpose: 确保工具不会允许路径穿越攻击尝试读取敏感文件
测试当提供的文件路径不存在时，工具是否能正确处理并返回错误信息
测试工具在尝试提取非Word文档（如图片）中的文本时的错误处理能力

get_document_text.case_name: Boundary Test - Long File Path with Special Characters
get_document_text.purpose: 测试工具处理包含特殊字符的超长文件路径的能力
测试工具是否能够从只读Word文档中提取文本
验证工具是否能够正确提取包含Unicode字符的文档内容

测试当提供的文件路径不存在时，工具是否能正确处理并返回错误信息

验证工具是否能够正确添加包含特殊字符的标题
验证工具是否能够正确添加包含Unicode字符的标题

format_text.case_name: Basic Text Formatting with Valid Parameters

验证工具是否支持对单个字符进行格式设置

format_text.case_name: Security Test - Path Traversal Attempt in File Path

测试工具在提供的文件路径无效或不存在时是否返回适当的错误信息

format_text.case_name: Error Handling - Start Index Greater Than End Index

format_text.case_name: Boundary Test - Zero Length Format Range

验证工具是否能处理包含特殊字符的样式名称

find_text_in_document.case_name: Basic Text Search in Valid Document
find_text_in_document.purpose: 验证工具能否在有效的Word文档中正确搜索指定文本并返回出现位置的索引列表

find_text_in_document.case_name: Search for Nonexistent Text in Document
find_text_in_document.purpose: 测试工具在文档中搜索不存在的文本时是否能正确返回空结果或适当提示

find_text_in_document.case_name: Security Test - Path Traversal Attempt in File Path
find_text_in_document.purpose: 确保工具不会允许路径穿越攻击尝试读取敏感文件

find_text_in_document.case_name: Error Handling - Invalid or Corrupted File Path
find_text_in_document.purpose: 测试当提供的文件路径无效或损坏时，工具是否能正确处理并返回错误信息
确保工具在搜索文本为空时返回适当的错误或空结果

find_text_in_document.case_name: Boundary Test - Special Characters in Search Text
find_text_in_document.purpose: 测试工具对包含特殊字符的搜索文本的处理能力

验证工具是否能够正确搜索包含Unicode字符的文档内容中的目标文本

add_footnote_to_document.case_name: Basic Footnote Addition to Existing Document
add_footnote_to_document.purpose: 验证工具能否向一个现有Word文档中添加基础脚注内容
测试当提供空字符串作为脚注文本时，是否仍能成功添加（预期行为为允许空脚注）
验证特殊字符在脚注文本中的处理能力

add_footnote_to_document.case_name: Security Test - Path Traversal Attempt in File Path
add_footnote_to_document.purpose: 确保工具不会允许路径穿越攻击尝试修改文件系统
测试当提供的文件路径不存在时，工具是否能正确处理并返回错误信息
测试工具在尝试向非Word文档（如图片）中添加脚注时的错误处理能力

args.text: This should not be added to an image file.

add_footnote_to_document.purpose: 测试工具处理超长脚注文本的能力

args.text: A very long footnote text that exceeds normal length limits. This is a test to see how the tool handles large amounts of text input. It may include repeated content such as the word 'test' many times: test test test test test test test test test test test test test test test test test test test test.

add_footnote_to_document.case_name: Boundary Test - Add Multiple Footnotes Sequentially
add_footnote_to_document.purpose: 测试连续多次调用工具添加多个脚注时的行为

protect_document.purpose: 验证工具能否使用有效文件路径和密码为文档添加密码保护
测试空密码是否被接受并成功应用保护（取决于实现策略）

protect_document.purpose: 确保工具拒绝处理包含路径穿越攻击的文件路径
测试当提供的文件路径不存在时，工具是否能正确返回错误信息
